title: FS: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap Piedmont 350-460 SGC 10/1

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Mathewson Dark Cap Piedmont 350-460 SGC 10/1
posts.post_content:
For sale is a T206 Mathewson Dark Cap with a Piedmont 350-460 back graded SGC 10/1. $210 delivered. Tough to find a Matty for less. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with questions or offers.

$210 Delivered
